long_description: The men's Sugoi Pace 7 shorts boast high-performance, sweat-ready fabric and plenty of features designed help you run farther and faster, no matter the distance. Lightweight, breathable fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, keeping you cool and comfortable; spandex offers comfortable stretch. Inner polyester liner also features wicking and quick-dring capabilities for continual comfort. Elastic waistband with interior drawcord provides customized fit. Hand pockets store small items while on the go; interior key pocket easily secures house key, ID or small media player. The men's Sugoi Pace 7 shorts feature an additional zip pocket on center back that offers a place to stow gels or other necessities on your runs. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Sugoi Pace 7 shorts boast high-performance, sweat-ready fabric and plenty of features designed help you run farther and faster, no matter the distance.
